channel.title: Comments on: Pancake coma setting in
channel.description: A miscellany of know-it-all-isms by Geoff Sowrey

item.title: By: Lyn
item.dc:creator: Lyn
item.description: I guess I should have stolen your chair earlier :) Limiting myself to 2 pancakes was a really good plan - more than that, and I might as well have eaten cheesecake at 8am - same sedative effect.
item.content:encoded:
I guess I should have stolen your chair earlier ðŸ™‚
Limiting myself to 2 pancakes was a really good plan – more than that, and I might as well have eaten cheesecake at 8am – same sedative effect.
